title: @Riot we need more poro snax in ARAM!
body: 1 poro snax throughout the game simply isn't enough. I want to make ALL poros happy, and the only way to do this is by giving them as many treats as possible. So here is my suggestion. Every time you die, you are given 1 free poro snax when you enter the fountain. Simple as that. Don't forget to feed the poros!

replies.body: No. ARAM would be a suicide-fest.
I tried to tell them to feed the poros, but all they wanted to do was run down lane and blame me for not CSing enough (while 19/2)
